name: Cream
description: Cream is a hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Wedding Cake and Gelato #33. Cream is 14% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for beginner cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us Cream effects include feeling focused, aroused, and tingly. Medical marijuana patients often choose Cream when dealing with symptoms associated with muscle spasms, pain, and depression. Bred by Cream Crop Co, Cream features flavors like flowery, berry, and pungent. The dominant terpene of this strain is Myrcene.
